::Switchblade::
Switchblade hits the wall with a thud and falls to the ground landing 
on his rear. "Ouch!" he cries indignantly, "Whadda ya think you're 
doing, kicking me around and stuff! He stalks out of the room 
grumbling.


On 4 Mar 2001, at 16:44, Robert Dahl wrote:

> Motormaster looks at the roof and sighs, Squawktalk was bad enough, now he
> has to put up with this one too. How did Megatron manages lead us, he
> thought to himself. This one seemed to like to hear the sound of his own
> voice. But there was silence, ahhhh blessed silence. He looked around
> though, he couldnt see where the robot had gone. He looked down and saw him
> sitting on his foot. He strained himself hard, not to grab down, and mash
> the robot right away. They needed as many troops as possible. Maybe later,
> he thought to himself, as he violently kicked the leg that Switchblade was
> sitting on, to send him flying.
>
